changeSet.author: ggokulraj
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS liquibase_demo ( id VARCHAR(36) PRIMARY KEY, test_field VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);
